name: coursera_compare_courses
description: Compare multiple courses on Coursera by searching and extracting their ratings, providers, enrollment counts, and levels side by side.

parameters.name: courses
parameters.description: Comma-separated course names (e.g. 'machine learning,deep learning,data science')

detailSteps.code: const params = new URLSearchParams(window.location.search); const searchQuery = params.get('query') || ''; const cards = document.querySelectorAll('[class*="cds-CommonCard"], li[class*="ais-Hits"]'); let first = cards.length > 0 ? cards[0] : null; if (!first) { const link = document.querySelector('a[href*="/learn/"]'); return { search_query: searchQuery, name: '', provider: '', rating: '', url: link ? link.href : '' }; } const titleEl = first.querySelector('h3[class*="cds-CommonCard-title"], h3, h2'); const providerEl = first.querySelector('[class*="cds-ProductCard-partnerNames"], [class*="partner"] p, p + p'); const ratingEl = first.querySelector('[role="meter"], [class*="cds-RatingStar"], [aria-label*="stars"]'); const metaEls = first.querySelectorAll('[class*="cds-CommonCard-metadata"] p, [class*="metadata"] span'); let enrollment = ''; let level = ''; metaEls.forEach(function(m) { const t = m.textContent.trim(); if (t.match(/\d+[KkMm]?\s*(student|learner|enroll)/i)) enrollment = t; else if (t.match(/(beginner|intermediate|advanced|mixed)/i)) level = t; }); const linkEl = first.querySelector('a[href*="/learn/"], a[href*="/specializations/"]'); return { search_query: searchQuery, name: titleEl ? titleEl.textContent.trim() : '', provider: providerEl ? providerEl.textContent.trim() : '', rating: ratingEl ? (ratingEl.getAttribute('aria-label') || ratingEl.textContent.trim()) : '', enrollment: enrollment, level: level, url: linkEl ? linkEl.href : '' }
detailSteps.name: course_info
detailSteps.label: Extract top result
